item.title: JPA
item.description: Comparison with JPA (Java Persistence API) 1. Query Handling JPA: In JPA, the framework abstracts away the SQL queries by using JPQL (Java Persistence Query Language) or a Criteria API.

item.title: Jooq
item.description: Comparison with JOOQ Framework What is JOOQ? JOOQ (Java Object Oriented Querying) is a powerful and widely used Java framework for building type-safe SQL queries.

item.title: The Future of Java Persistence
item.description: we will explore the history, theory, and technology behind the evolution of persistence technologies for Java applications.

item.title: Example Reference
item.description: Reference pages are ideal for outlining how things work in terse and clear terms. Less concerned with telling a story or addressing a specific use case, they should give a comprehensive outline of what your documenting.
